com.software.reuze

Interface mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    mpt_i_InferenceForwardBackward
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    mp_HMMInferenceForwardBackward, mp_HMMInferenceForwardBackwardConstantSpace, mpt_InferenceForwardBackward

    public interface mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep
    * The FORWARD operator is defined by Equation (15.5).
     P(Xt+1 | e1:t+1) 
 = αP(et+1 | Xt+1)∑xtP(Xt+1 | xt, e1:t)P(xt | e1:t)
 = αP(et+1 | Xt+1)∑xtP(Xt+1 | xt)P(xt | e1:t) (Markov Assumption)
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly
